Product description

A geek is someone who is more interested in Movies, Music, Superheroes, TV Series, Comic Books, Gaming or Video Games and anything which doesn't involve physical activity. Alternatively, one can also be a geek if he has acquired exceptional technical expertise in some field. To do our bit for our Geek Brethren, Niev brings this cool geek t-shirt to you. Pair it with a pair of jeans or shorts and you are ready to rock! Our t-shirts are made of 100% Cotton, 180 GSM Bio-Washed Pre-Shrunk fabric in order to provide maximum comfort and durability. The printing is best in class using high quality inks with top washability ratings so that the print doesn't go even after multiple washes. We recommend hand wash for this piece of art but in case you wash it in machine, wash it on delicate mode. Please refer to the size chart in the product images to avoid any size related confusion. Just in case the size doesn't fit, please place an exchange order and we will replace the t-shirt for you. In case you find any quality related issue(after all we all are humans), please place a return request and we will replace the product asap. We thrive to provide best experience to our customers and will love to hear you through product ratings/reviews.
